projectPurpose: To enable users to perform fast and efficient local searches of legal judgment documents from the official China Judgment Document Network (wenshu.court.gov.cn).
platforms: Likely requires local setup (e.g., Windows, macOS, Linux) based on Rust language.
mainFeatures: Local search of Chinese court judgment documents
Indexes documents from China Judgment Document Network

marketPositioning: cases is positioned as a free and open-source tool for local searching of Chinese court judgments, offering a potential advantage in speed and offline access compared to the official online platform. It serves as a technically-oriented alternative to comprehensive but expensive commercial legal databases, focusing specifically on judgment documents and requiring local setup.
